name: DISENFRANCHISED / DISS & FRENCH FRIES
description: One of the many things that Covid19 showed us was just how the middle class has slowly eroded from American society. It became clear as day to millions of Americans that more and more people were living at or near the poverty line, especially people of color. The social and economic inequities were all out in the open for the world to see. Cracks in the foundations of trust between the working class and "The System" were becoming chasms. During the lockdown many people who could not work from home had to keep working and risk getting infected and potentially infect others and their own families, many of which were multi-generational homes. This particular work explores these inequities using homophones (a word that is pronounced the same as another word, but differs in meaning).
